name: Securities eligible for deposit
text: §431:7-303  Securities eligible for deposit.  All deposits shall consist of cash or other assets comprised of securities which are eligible for the investment of the funds of insurers under section 431:6-301 representing public obligations, and section 431:6-302 representing corporate obligations. [L 1987, c 347, pt of §2; am L 1989, c 195, §17]
